summary: Mudcrab and Creeper Merchants added in Riverwood and Markarth respectively with 10k gold to buy from you. They all offer their own wares to sell.
descriptionHtml:
What this mod does:

This mod adds two NPCs with 10k gold to buy your stuff: The Mudcrab Merchant outside of Riverwood in the middle of the river named \"Mudcrab\" and in Markarth\'s Silver-Blood Inn, in the first room on the right, a Dwarven Spider named \"Creeper\".

They are currently voiced in order to enable trading.

Where they\'re located:
Mudcrab is located in the middle of the river next to the tree past the Blacksmith\'s house in Riverwood. Creeper is in the Silver-Blood Inn in the small room to the right.

What they sell:

The Mudcrab Merchant sells only ingredients currently but will not sell anything that comes from hostile creatures like Daedra Hearts, Bear/Hagraven Claws, etc. He has a random list of ingredients including insects and fish, the list is set to spawn up to 300 ingredients. He does NOT sell Dwarven Oil.

Creeper sells a random assortment of Dwarven \"clutter\" such as bowls, scrap, and Dwarven Arrows. The list that controls them can sell 100 items. She sells Dwarven Oil in varying amounts.

The price they buy things at will be the same as other merchants, but they have 10k gold!


What they buy:

Mudcrab buys everything except items marked unsellable, keys, and stolen items.

Creeper buys everything Mudcrab buys, including stolen items.


Skyrim Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12630
Steamworks: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=15786
author: Domino
